phrases: I just realised it for the first time
That I had fallen in love
Twenty-four hours a day thinking of you, you and nothing more than you!
It is something I was not consciously aware of
Somehow ( somehow) I am feeling different from the usual
With you ( the two of us) and our dull chatter
Do not tell me ( mutual love?)
Nope, it is a one-sided crush
Why is my heart pounding like this?
Did a short circuit just make a mess out of my mind?
This is my first time... feeling like this...
I wonder if I have a fever
Suddenly and precipitately, love has arrived.
Instantly igniting my face into a bright red
Is this really what they call love?
I want to know your feelings.
I feel I could fly towards the sky
Woke up in the morning, brushed my teeth
In the blink of an eye, it is 10pm
Today, we laughed a whole lot
At times, with my friends, acting like fools, being noisy
I would not call this my first love
Say, will we be able to meet again tomorrow?
I see you sparkling all over the place
Today was fun, too, was not it?
It is my pleasure to meet you, my new-found love.
Surely, we will meet again tomorrow
We will meet immediately in our dreams
TL note: Ume is an Asian fruit, otherwise known as the Japanese apricot or Chinese plum.
TL note: Umeboshi is pickled ume that is often added to onigiri (Japanese rice balls).
TL note: This is a reference to the painting The Creation of Adam, by Michelangelo, on the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel.
The discipline at this school has been lacking lately.
I would like you to be a little more strict on keeping students to the school rules, Sakurai-sensei.
That is right, I became a student guidance counsellor in order to change myself!
I will have to make sure that they stick to the rules.
What is this, all of a sudden?!
But it is not good, since it is only allowed during lunchtime.
What seems to be the problem, Miss?
I do not think it is good manners to eat while walking...
My stomach would not stop growling,
most likely because I did not eat breakfast.
I will take it off now, sorry about that.
As long as you understand, it is...
I am glad that he understands it when I tell him.
Suddenly shouting in the middle of the hallway?!
You should think about your surroundings for a bit!
YOU-Um, you cannot take something like that to school...
Sasahara, I have something to talk to you about during lunch, so...
This school might really be lacking discipline.
Tachibana Misato did not mean any harm either.
That frilly thing around your neck...
I was thinking it is kind of cute.
The ordinary days that we have been living might actually be a chain of miracles.
As it were, it might be something like that.
Ah, hm, so in other words, what is that frilly thing...
Well then, Miss, we shall meet again in class.
I was thinking that having a hairstyle like yours at school is a little...
Ah no, only a little, just a little...
I did not quite hear that, can you say it once more...
It will not grow from the sides!
I have been thinking of making some umeboshi at home this year.
Ume are good for your health, you know.
Besides, if you put it in your onigiri, the rice will not spoil.
I have not even said anything yet.
We just bought a lot of snacks recently, have not we?
We will finish those first, and then we can go buy more again...
Ah yeah, we also promised to buy Sakamoto-san's food,
Can I help you with anything?
Ah, maybe it is something like shaved ice.
You are going to buy it?
N-No, I am only taking a look.
If you are not going to buy it, can you give it to me?
Why can Nano buy the things Nano wants,
but Professor cannot buy the things Professor wants?
No, as I said, this is just...
Since Nano is buying the things Nano wants,
it is okay for Professor to buy the things Professor wants too!
I want it, I want it, I really want it, I want it!
So that is how you ended up buying that thing?
Yes, it is cute, and since it is cold, it feels good.
They want me to eat... shaved ice?
First comes rock, next comes paper, rockscispaper does not count,
When you think of what other people are looking for,
you might not know because there are so many other people.
When you think of what you are looking for,
is not it a little bit of love?
After that, you have just got to pray to a god somewhere.
a god somewhere, pleased to meet you.
Maybe you should stop that already?
I have adapted quite well to this body.
Just by looking at them, I cannot stop drooling.
You cannot eat them, because they are not done yet.
I will use this to play with Sakamoto.
Hey, kid, I have told you so many times to put -san after it!
Are you making fun of me?
You are doing it on purpose, are not you?!
Well then, I am going shopping!
Seriously, the people here really have not been educated, have they?
I am sorry, Sakamoto, I am not doing it on purpose.
I am telling you, it is not Sakamoto!
Here, Sakamoto, I will give you some gum.
How many times are you going to make me say it!?
Besides, have you ever heard of someone giving gum to a cat, you dumbas - Whoa!
Listen, I have told you before that I am older than you two.
Adding -san when you address people older than you is...
You are taking it with you, huh?
From what I can see, there are only two kids living in this house.
No wonder they are not educated.
Which means, I am the oldest in this house.
It will be troublesome, but I will act as their parent.
Seriously, I have been taken in by one hell of a house.
This is bad, yet it is so fun!
if she finds out that I was playing with the eraser,
my place as parent will be...!
My place as parent will be...
I might have slept for a bit.
Cats sure do sleep a lot.
There are a lot of things lying around here, so...
First off, should not you start by apologising to your elders?
This is bad, but it is really fun!
Whoa, Sakamoto, do it again, do it again!
N-No you are wrong, I was just...
I mean, did not I tell you to put -san after it?!
Mai-chan is doing her hard-to-get jokes again.
For now, I will take a jab at her.
Mai-chan, is not that on the book?
Yukko, do not ever try to take a jab at me like that again.
When you take such a good jab at me,
it overshadows my funny man act.
No, it is that, you know?
I am at the age where you start to unintentionally use English,
But you know, it was difficult to figure out if that on the book was serious or a joke.
Well, how do you call it, I just had to take a jab at it.
It is because it is you.
Because it is you, I thought you would understand.
I did not think you thought of me like that,
but I am happy that you have faith in me.
so can you stop talking about having or not having faith in you?
You do not need words between best friends, right?
Seriously, Mai-chan, it is okay to have a few words exchanged even between best friends, is not it?
If you are all over me like that, I will be troubled.
If you do that, I will fall...
I will fall even more in love with you.
It is okay to like me more, right?
That is not the problem here.
We are not of the opposite sex, but it is kind of like I see you as one...
Somehow, I thought she was a bit odd today.
She is talking more than usual.
She even said we should take a detour on the way home.
Was everything she did for the purpose of saying this?
Since when did she start to feel that way?
H-How do I put it, I-I am not really sure about those things...
I mean, it really is a bit too soon to say something like that.
I mean, we are still high schoolers after all!
That was a joke just now.
Geez, stop putting on such weird acts.
I sorta believed you for a moment there.
and you are quick on the uptake, so I thought you would understand.
Well, I did understand a little.
No, no, it is not a lie or anything.
It is like my head got the idea.
Like, I really did understand it.
Thinking about it, that was a weird conversation just now.
Did not you just say you believed it?
I hate people who lie the most.
I cannot tell if these are jokes or not any more!
When I said you are quick on the uptake...
However, that one is somehow very easy to understand.
It is already been 40 years, this multi-unit apartment.
You will find an unbelievable degree of sexiness to it.
Next week's Nichijou is the fifth one.
